text: Lemme recap what I know so far.
The Dragon General can take exactly 20 attacks, while I can only exactly 3.
I have three attacks, a ground/wall-slam, an axe attack, and a projectile reflect.
Shooting a laser beam, creating an earth tremor...
Wow, that matches up exactly with what I gleaned using magic.
Wait, you knew all this already?
Why didn't you tell me at the start!
It's better you learn from the real thing. That's why we're using my loops.
You didn't get paired up with the Info Mage, you got paired up with me, the Loop Mage.
And besides, we're probably a better fit for each other anyways.
